issue.title: [C++] Implement product aggregate & hash aggregate kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13575](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13575). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Like Pandas [prod](https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/reference/api/pandas.core.groupby.GroupBy.prod.html). Note that Pandas has a min_count option.
